tool_description: Generates comprehensive reports on checkout performance with actionable optimization recommendations based on funnel analysis and A/B test results.

include_segments.description: User segments to include in report

include_ab_tests.description: Whether to include A/B test results

error_messages: Invalid report period: End date must be after start date
Invalid date range: Report period cannot exceed 180 days
Invalid include_segments: Must contain valid segment identifiers
Invalid focus_areas: Must contain valid focus area identifiers
Insufficient data: Report period contains insufficient data for analysis
usage: Generate optimization reports by specifying report period and focus areas. Optionally filter by user segments and include A/B test insights.
